channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【How Shopify Prepares for Black Friday】Shopify 如何准备黑色星期五
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at how Shopify prepared for success during the Super Bowl of commerce.】在本文中，我们将了解 Shopify 如何为商业超级碗期间的成功做好准备。

item.title: 【Multimodal LLMs Basics: How LLMs Process Text, Images, Audio & Videos】多模式法学硕士基础知识：法学硕士如何处理文本、图像、音频和视频
item.description: 【For a long time, AI systems were specialists confined to a single sense.】长期以来，人工智能系统都是局限于单一感官的专家。

item.title: 【EP194: Evolution of HTTP】EP194：HTTP 的演变
item.description: 【The Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) has evolved over the years to meet the needs of modern applications, from simple text delivery to high-performance, real-time experiences.】超文本传输​​协议 (HTTP) 多年来不断发展，以满足现代应用程序的需求，从简单的文本传输到高性能、实时体验。

item.title: 【A Guide to Retry Pattern in Distributed Systems】分布式系统中的重试模式指南
item.description: 【In this article, we will explore the retry pattern in depth, understand when and how to use it safely and effectively.】在本文中，我们将深入探讨重试模式，了解何时以及如何安全有效地使用它。

item.title: 【How Meta Built a New AI-Powered Ads Model for 5% Better Conversions】Meta 如何构建新的 AI 驱动的广告模型以提高 5% 的转化率
item.description: 【In this article, we look at how the Meta engineering team built GEM and the challenges they overcame.】在本文中，我们将了解 Meta 工程团队如何构建 GEM 以及他们克服的挑战。

item.title: 【How LinkedIn Built an AI-Powered Hiring Assistant】LinkedIn 如何构建人工智能驱动的招聘助理
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at the architecture and technical building blocks of LinkedIn’s Hiring Assistant.】在本文中，我们将了解 LinkedIn 招聘助手的架构和技术构建模块。

item.title: 【Top AI Agentic Workflow Patterns】顶级 AI 代理工作流程模式
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at the most popular agentic workflow patterns and how they work.】在本文中，我们将了解最流行的代理工作流模式及其工作原理。

item.title: 【EP193: Database Types You Should Know in 2025】EP193：2025 年您应该了解的数据库类型
item.description: 【There’s no such thing as a one-size-fits-all database anymore.】不再有“一刀切”的数据库了。

item.title: 【How OpenAI, Gemini, and Claude Use Agents to Power Deep Research】OpenAI、Gemini 和 Claude 如何使用代理来推动深度研究
item.description: 【We will walk through the architecture that enables Deep Research, how different LLMs implement it, how agents coordinate with one another, and how the final report is synthesized and validated before being delivered to the user.】我们将介绍支持深度研究的架构、不同的法学硕士如何实施它、代理如何相互协调，以及最终报告在交付给用户之前如何合成和验证。

item.title: 【Must-Know System Performance Strategies】必须了解的系统性能策略
item.description: 【In this article, we will look at system performance in detail, understand how it can be measured, and investigate key strategies that can be used to improve the performance of a system on different levels.】在本文中，我们将详细研究系统性能，了解如何测量它，并研究可用于在不同级别提高系统性能的关键策略。
